explanations.deep learning: The paper presents a deep learning approach based on bidirectional long short-term memory networks for forecasting yearly peak loads.
explanations.long short-term memory: The paper utilizes bidirectional long short-term memory (LSTM) networks as part of its deep learning approach for load forecasting.
explanations.LSTM: The paper specifically mentions using bidirectional long short-term memory (LSTM) networks in its methodology.
